SEARCH
Package com.github.epadronu.dwalin.core

Interface Page

All Superinterfaces:
AbstractionLayer
All Known Subinterfaces:
NavigablePage
public non-sealed interface Page extends AbstractionLayer

Models a web page, being an implementation of a page class under the Page Object Model pattern.

This interface exposed an API for linking pages and components.

  • Method Details

    • asComponent

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull default <P extends Page, C extends Component<P>> C asComponent(com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement element, BiFunction<P,com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement,C> componentFactory)

      Creates a new component linked to this page.

      Type Parameters:
      P - the type of page the component will be linked to
      C - the type of component to be created
      Parameters:
      element - the root element for this component
      componentFactory - method capable of creating the new component (usually a constructor)
      Returns:
      a new instant of the desired component

    • asComponents

      @CheckReturnValue @Nonnull default <P extends Page, C extends Component<P>> List<C> asComponents(com.codeborne.selenide.ElementsCollection elements, BiFunction<P,com.codeborne.selenide.SelenideElement,C> componentFactory)

      Creates new components for all elements contained in the collection and that will be linked to this page.

      Type Parameters:
      P - the type of page the components will be linked to
      C - the type of component to be created
      Parameters:
      elements - the elements for which new components will be created
      componentFactory - method capable of creating the new components (usually a constructor)
      Returns:
      an unmodifiable list with the new components
